base_description: Metal scissors with red handles, medium-sized.
part_description: Two metal blades, sharp and pointed, intersect at a pivot. Red plastic handles are oval-shaped, attached to the blades' ends.
internal_interaction_description: The blades pivot around a central point, allowing them to open and close. The handles facilitate this movement, enabling the blades to cut when the handles are squeezed together.
external_interaction_description: Scissors are held by the handles, allowing a user to cut paper, fabric, or other materials. The sharp blades slice through materials with precision, depending on the applied force.
